Name: <color=#FF0000>[Beo]</color>Colt AR-15 5.56x45 30-round STANAG Magazine
Description: <color=#FF0000>[Compatible with .50 Beowulf rounds]</color> The 30-round Colt AR-15 magazine is designed for 5.56x45 ammunition and complies with the STANAG 4179 standardization agreement. STANAG 4179, approved by NATO member countries in 1980, aims to standardize ammunition and magazines for allied forces.
